metadata.title: Cassette Tape Front Door Mat Welcome Mat, Durable Indoor Outdoor Doormat Rug Entryway Mat Absorbent and Waterproof Rugs for Entry, Non Slip Entrance Rug Front Door Decor
features: 【 Size 】: The doormat measures 24 x 36 inches. Doormats are perfect for everyday homes and are perfect for any dust and moisture-prone space in your home.

【 Non-Slip & Durable 】: The doormat is 100% Polyester. The doormat is made of soft memory foam and high-density space-stretch cotton sandwich composite material, with a hard-wearing, non-slip backing, making the doormat durable, strong and versatile to decorate your porch.
【 Easy To Clean 】: The doormat is easy to clean, stain resistant and won't fall off. Easy to care for, vacuum regularly and treat stains with a mild detergent or carpet cleaner.

【 Keeps Floors Clean 】: Doormats absorb moisture quickly to keep floors clean and dry. The doormat is soft to the touch, with fine fluff, no pilling, no fading, and effectively relieves foot pressure.

【 Occasion 】: Doormat is suitable for indoor, outdoor, room, bedroom, bathroom, living room, dining room, patio, children's room, study, dormitory, kitchen, office, porch, corridor, home decoration, etc.
description: The doormat measures 24 x 36 inches. Doormats are perfect for everyday homes and are perfect for any dust and moisture-prone space in your home.
Doormats are beautifully printed and available in many different patterns, you can easily find a mat that matches your home decor. A great gift option for friends and family.
Our doormats are easy to clean by simply brushing, shaking or vacuuming to remove excess dirt and debris, spot cleaning as needed.

Due to the limited delivery volume, the floor mat is folded for delivery. If there are creases, roll the rug in the opposite direction while applying pressure to the rug, take the edge, turn over where the creases are, and slowly pull the rug back while applying downward pressure to the crease. Place only half of the doormat on a clean, dry floor. Water under the mat may cause slipping. Keep the bottom of the pad dry.

title: Accssoey Funny Door Mat, Welcome Mat
